titleStmt.title: The exact effigies of a monstrous Tartar taken in Hungary by the valour of the noble Count Serini February, 1664.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for W. Gilbertson at the [...]; and H. Marsh at the Princes Armes in Chancery Lane,

notesStmt.note: Verse - "Bless us! what have we here! what prodigy".
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
